note:
HI I'm James
I'm an artist from North Wales, living in London and posting doodles, digital painting and artwork/animations made in Blender.

I work as a 2D Lead/Supervisor in the VFX industry (currently at Industrial Light and Magic) and have worked on shows such 'Lost Ollie', 'Willow', 'The Mandalorian', 'The Dark Crystal', 'Black Mirror' and began my career working on 'Dr Who'.

I love Studio Ghibli, Comics, Animation, Anime, Manga, Giallo and Horror films.
